introduction.title:
The first-ever 
Tanweer Festival
introduction.paragraph_one: Introducing the inaugural Tanweer Festival, a three-day celebration that transcends language, culture, and borders. Experience a soulful blend of live music, nourishing food, a vibrant marketplace, and inspiring art installations. Engage in workshops that elevate the soul, and partake in on-site experiences like stargazing, horse riding, and other activities that nurture a holistic sense of well-being.
introduction.paragraph_two: Sign up for the latest updates on our music performances, art installations, workshops, poetry sessions, and more.

activity.title: book your experience
activity.description: Embark on a range of adventures during the inaugural Tanweer Festival. From thrills and excitement to relaxation and rejuvenation, there’s something for everyone.
